title: Introduction to American History
description: In-depth analysis of american history principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Principles of Cultural History
description: In-depth analysis of cultural history principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Intermediate Military History
description: Comprehensive study of military history with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Cultural History
description: Comprehensive study of cultural history with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Political History
description: In-depth analysis of political history principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Social History
description: In-depth analysis of social history principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Advanced World History
description: Rigorous treatment of world history theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Graduate American History
description: Interdisciplinary approach to american history combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.
prerequisites: ARTH 399 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Modern History
description: Rigorous treatment of modern history theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: ARTH 315 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Cultural History
description: Rigorous treatment of cultural history theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: ARTH 320 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Ancient History
description: Rigorous treatment of ancient history theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: ARTH 384 and senior standing or graduate status
